text: Tabou is a town in the far southwest of Ivory Coast. It is a sub-prefecture of and the seat of Tabou Department in San-Pédro Region, Bas-Sassandra District. Tabou is also a commune. In 2014, the population of the sub-prefecture of Tabou was 38,990 . ==Villages== The thirty two villages of the sub-prefecture of Tabou and their population in 2014 are : ==Climate== ==References== Category:Sub-prefectures of San-Pédro Region Category:Communes of San-Pédro Region
title: Tabou, Ivory Coast
